Address.label: Address
Address.value: 285 EAST GRAND AVENUE, SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, California, 94080, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Unity Biotechnology Inc designs therapeutics that prevent, halt, and reverse various diseases of aging. The company focuses on clearing senescent cells; and creating senolytic medicines. Its medicines target vulnerabilities unique to senescent cells to clear those cells from the human body while leaving normal cells unaffected. The firm focuses on age-associated diseases such as osteoarthritis, eye diseases, and pulmonary diseases.
